product_name: Croakies Arc Endless Eyewear Retainer - XL/XXL
long_description: Sized for sunglasses with large earpieces, the highly-adjustable Croakies Arc Endless Eyewear Retainer in size XL/XXL keeps your sunglasses close during active pursuits. Adjustable cable can be shortened or lengthened to customize the fit. Detachable plug 'n' play ends fit different-size earpieces, includes XXL and XL sizes. Croakies Arc Endless Eyewear Retainer is designed for active sports and rugged use.
short_description: Sized for sunglasses with large earpieces, the highly-adjustable Croakies Arc Endless Eyewear Retainer in size XL/XXL keeps your sunglasses close during active pursuits.
